# displaysAnnotations

**Instance Property**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether annotations are displayed for the page.

## Declaration

```swift
var displaysAnnotations: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the page will draw annotations when a drawing method is called.

## Related Documentation

- **draw(with:)**: Draws the page within the specified box.

## Working with Annotations

- **annotations**: Returns an array containing the page’s annotations.
- **addAnnotation(_:)**: Adds the specified annotation object to the page.
- **removeAnnotation(_:)**: Removes the specified annotation from the page.
- **annotation(at:)**: Returns the annotation, if there is one, at the specified point.
